EmailTemplate.name: MPW-Customer-GenericEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been submitted.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MPW reservation form {!MPW_Reservation__c.Name} for {!MPW_Reservation__c.MPW_Train_Name__c} has been submitted for review. You will receive an email shortly for approving record.
Thank You.
